alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 11:41PM CDT until April 21 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northern Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1141 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Seligman, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Gateway... Beaver... Urbanette... Grandview... Pleasant Ridge... Hill Top... Beaver Lake... Walnut Hill... Oak Hill... Busch... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
